column4: hello i installed firefox 3.5 but when i opened it, it still says 3.0 under 'about'; can anyone advise? thanks!
its called shiretoko if from ubuntu repos
i just copied and pasted sudo apt-get install firefox-3.5
right then that is called shiretoko
check in applications internet you should see shiretoko there
yes, it's there. How do i replace firefox ap with shiretoko?
you mean the icon from the panel or on your desktop? right click drag from menu
on the top of the desktop tray thing
you dont replace it per se, it stays side by side with ff3
top panel, right click delete
oh, ok is there any reason why? can't i get rid of it?
but i want the familiar icon
the shiretoki thing has a different icon
then open apps -- internet menu right click drag
i can get a shortcut, but with a different icon; how do i get the familar icon?
and can i delete ff3?
thanks for your help and time
no problem
so can i delete ff3?
somewhat less than 700mb
type three or so letters then hit tab key to nick complete
